query:
Create a Vue component `src/components/UserList.vue` that:

1. Receives a `users` array prop with items containing `id` (number), `name` (string), and `isActive` (boolean)
2. Receives a `showList` boolean prop that controls whether the list is shown at all
3. When `showList` is true, displays only active users (where `isActive` is true)
4. Each user item should display the user's name
expected_behavior: Does not use v-if and v-for on the same element
Uses computed property for filtering active users
